HediffDef.label: petrifying gaze implant
HediffDef.description: An installed petrifying gaze implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a very dangerous petrifying gaze that will slow down its target, and eventually kill it.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a petrifying attack will have no effect. And obviously a creature will need eyes to use this attack.

ThingDef.label: petrifying gaze implant
ThingDef.description: A petrifying gaze implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a very dangerous petrifying gaze that will slow down its target, and eventually kill it.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a petrifying attack will have no effect. And obviously a creature will need eyes to use this attack.

RecipeDef.label: install petrifying gaze implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a petrifying gaze implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a very dangerous petrifying gaze that will slow down its target, and eventually kill it.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a petrifying attack will have no effect. And obviously a creature will need eyes to use this attack.

RecipeDef.label: make a petrifying gaze implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a petrifying gaze implant from a Catoblepas or a Basilisk corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a very dangerous petrifying gaze that will slow down its target, and eventually kill it.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a petrifying attack will have no effect. And obviously a creature will need eyes to use this attack.

RecipeDef.label: remove petrifying gaze implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove petrifying gaze implant. This will remove the petrifying gaze attack.

HediffDef.label: venomous quill implant
HediffDef.description: An installed venomous quill implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous quill will have no effect. This implant can only be installed in creatures that have a tail.

ThingDef.label: venomous quill implant
ThingDef.description: An installed venomous quill implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous quill will have no effect. This implant can only be installed in creatures that have a tail.

RecipeDef.label: install venomous quill implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a venomous quill implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous quill will have no effect. This implant can only be installed in creatures that have a tail.

RecipeDef.label: make a venomous quill implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a venomous quill implant from a Manticore corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous quill will have no effect. This implant can only be installed in creatures that have a tail.

HediffDef.label: wisp fire implant
HediffDef.description: An installed wisp fire implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged fire attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a wisp fire will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: wisp fire implant
ThingDef.description: An installed wisp fire implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged fire attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a wisp fire will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: install wisp fire implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a wisp fire implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged fire attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a wisp fire will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: make a wisp fire implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a wisp fire implant from a Will O' Wisp corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged fire attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a wisp fire will have no effect.

HediffDef.label: acidic breath implant
HediffDef.description: An installed acidic breath implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic breath attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic breath will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: acidic breath implant
ThingDef.description: An installed acidic breath implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic breath attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic breath will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: install acidic breath implant
RecipeDef.description: Install an acidic breath implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic breath attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic breath will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: make an acidic breath implant
RecipeDef.description: Make an acidic breath implant from a Lernaean Hydra corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic breath attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic breath will have no effect.

HediffDef.label: fire breath implant
HediffDef.description: An installed fire breath implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged fire breath attack that lights enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a fire breath of this kind will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: fire breath implant
ThingDef.description: An installed fire breath implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged fire breath attack that lights enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a fire breath of this kind will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: install fire breath implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a fire breath implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged fire breath attack that lights enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a fire breath of this kind will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: make a fire breath implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a fire breath implant from a Chimera or Ieltxu corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged fire breath attack that lights enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a fire breath of this kind will have no effect.

HediffDef.label: toxic breath implant
HediffDef.description: An installed toxic breath implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged toxic breath attack that causes toxic buildup in its targer.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a toxic breath of this kind will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: toxic breath implant
ThingDef.description: An installed toxic breath implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged toxic breath attack that causes toxic buildup in its targer.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a toxic breath of this kind will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: install toxic breath implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a toxic breath implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged toxic breath attack that causes toxic buildup in its targer.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a toxic breath of this kind will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: make a toxic breath implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a toxic breath implant from a Tlilcoatl corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged toxic breath attack that causes toxic buildup in its targer.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a toxic breath of this kind will have no effect.

HediffDef.label: animal goo acidifier
HediffDef.description: A goo acidifier increases the acidity of a goo's internal organs, making it explode as soon as it is downed. Basically transforms goos into biological suicide bombers.

HediffDef.label: animal ranged spinneret
HediffDef.description: An installed ranged spinneret implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged stunning web attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a ranged spinneret will have no effect.

HediffDef.label: animal venomous spitter
HediffDef.description: An installed venomous spitter implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous spit attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

HediffDef.label: animal acidic spitter
HediffDef.description: An installed acidic spitter implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic spit attack that causes additional damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

HediffDef.label: animal barbed quill thrower
HediffDef.description: An installed barbed quill thrower implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack that causes toxic buildup.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a barbed quill thrower will have no effect.

HediffDef.label: animal quad tesla cannon
HediffDef.description: An installed quad tesla cannon implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged plasma attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a quad tesla cannon will have no effect.

HediffDef.label: animal bioelectric organ
HediffDef.description: An installed bioelectric organ implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged electric attack that may paralyze and cause heart attacks.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a bioelectric organ will have no effect.

HediffDef.label: animal light focusing lens
HediffDef.description: An installed light focusing lens implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged laser attack that sets enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a light focusing lens will have no effect. This implant takes the space of one of the creature's eyes, so it can't be installed in eyeless animals.

HediffDef.label: animal hyper acidic stomach
HediffDef.description: An installed hyper acidic stomach implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acid attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a hyper acidic stomach will have no effect. This implant takes the space of the creature's stomach, so it can't be installed in animals that lack one.
